line.1: Little Storehouse is a collection of sermons by William Marrion Branham in various languages.
line.2: The application offers rich filtering of sermons by date and many other parameters.
line.3: A full text search of all sermons is also available.
line.4: Along with the text of the sermons, audio recordings of the sermons are available.
line.5: Little Storehouse is a non-commercial project.
line.6: It does not claim any rights to the texts of sermons or audio recordings used in the application.

available_platforms.additional_platforms: The app is also available for other types of operating systems.
available_platforms.supported_platform: The app is available on the following stores:
available_platforms.title: Available Platforms

2.b: French app translation, ideas, testing, motivation

project_support.title: Project Support Subscription

1.title: How to Restore the Audio Player

line.1: Downloaded audio can be deleted in two ways: by clicking on delete button in player and by filtering sermons with downloaded audio.
line.2: To delete audio in Audio Player:
line.3: 1. Start audio player in sermon page
line.5: To delete audio in Sermons List:
line.11: 6. Now you are able to delete audio by tapping on 'Delete' buttons

line.2: 1. Navigate to the Sermon page where you want to add a named bookmark.
line.3: 2. Press and hold the 'Add Bookmark' button.
line.4: 3. Enter the desired name for the bookmark in the dialog text field.
line.5: 4. Tap on the 'Create' button to finalize the addition of the named bookmark.

1.title: How to add bookmark with name

line.1: To edit highlighted text on the Sermon page, follow these steps:
line.2: 1. Tap on the highlighted text you wish to edit.
line.3: 2. On the bottom bar, you can change/edit the color, add a new color, or delete the highlighting.

1.title: How to edit highlighted text in Sermon Page

line.1: Color editing can be done in three ways: via the Edit Highlight bottom bar, the Colors Navigation bar, or the Colors page.
line.2: To edit from the Edit Highlight bottom bar:
line.3: 1. Tap on the selected text in the Sermon page or press and hold on a highlighted item in the Highlights list.
line.4: 2. Press and hold on the Color tile.
line.5: 3. Select a new color value and tap on the 'Save' button.
line.6: To edit from the Colors Navigation bar:
line.7: 1. Tap on the Highlights tile on the Home page.
line.8: 2. Press and hold on the Color tile on the Colors Navigation bar.
line.9: 3. Select a new color value and tap on the 'Save' button.
line.10: To edit from the Colors page:
line.11: 1. Tap on the Highlights tile on the Home page.
line.12: 2. Tap on the Edit Colors button.
line.13: 3. You can change a color's title or value, and also delete a color.

line.1: You can access the Edit Highlight bottom bar by pressing and holding on a Highlights List item.
line.3: 1. Tap on the Highlights tile on the Home page.
line.4: 2. Press and hold a Highlights List item.
line.5: 3. Edit or remove the highlight using the options in the bottom bar.

3.title: How to edit a highlight in Highlight List

line.1: The Split View layout is available for tablets, providing the possibility to resize the proportions of the Split View.
line.3: 1. Press and hold the Split View dividing bar.
line.4: 2. Drag left or right to adjust the size.
line.5: Note: There is a minimum size that the Split View can have for each side.

line.1: The Split View layout is available for tablets, providing the option to close or restore each side of the Split View.
line.2: To close the left or right side of the Split View:
line.3: 1. Tap the Split View button to close the right side.
line.4: 2. Tap the Split View button again to toggle the visibility of both sides.
line.5: 3. Press and hold the Split View button to restore the visibility of both sides.

2.title: How to close or restore Split View

line.1: To add note to a sermon line:
line.2: 1. Select a text in Sermon page
line.4: 3. Provide note content and tap 'Save' button

1.title: How to add note to a sermon line

line.1: To open a note on the Sermon Page:
line.2: 1. Locate a sermon line with a note icon at the end.
line.3: 2. Tap on the note icon to open the note preview view.

2.title: How to open note on Sermon Page

line.1: To copy selected text into a note:
line.2: 1. Select a text in Sermon page
line.3: 2. Select 'Copy to note' in context menu
line.5: 4. Provide changes in note if needed

3.title: How to copy selected text to note

line.2: 1. Tap on the translation button on the Sermon Page.
line.3: 2. Press and hold the Translation entry.
line.4: 3. (Optionally) Press and drag the dividing bar to adjust the size of the views.

1.title: How to open a parallel translation

line.2: 1. Press and hold the Sermon Split View button.

2.title: How to close a parallel translation

line.1: To have a sermon open at the last read position:
line.2: 1. Tap on the Settings button in the Sermons List.
line.3: 2. Turn off the 'Always open sermons at start position' option.
line.4: 3. Turn on the option to open sermons at the start position.

1.title: How to open sermon on last position

line.1: To copy search result to clipboard
line.2: 1. Long press on a search result
line.4: To copy search result to note
line.5: 1. Long press on a search result
line.6: 2. Select 'Copy to note' option in context menu

1.title: How to copy a search result

quote.footer: William Branham - An Exposition of the Seven Church Ages: A resume of the ages

line.1: Not for one moment do I bring a message to the people that they may follow me, or join my church, or start some fellowship and organization. I have never done that and will not do that now.
line.2: I have no interest in those things, but I do have an interest in the things of God and people, and if I can accomplish just one thing I will be satisfied. That one thing is to see established a true spiritual relationship between God and men, wherein men become new creations in Christ, filled with His Spirit and live according to His Word. I would invite, plead and warn all to hear His voice at this time, and yield your lives completely to Him, even as I trust in my heart that I have given my all to Him. God bless you, and may His coming rejoice your heart.

common.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

error.migration_already_done: It seems you’ve already completed the migration on another device. Please tap the Retry button, provide your password, and then tap the Sign In button to continue.

info.1: To continue using the app, we need to migrate your account and related data.

2.a: Please enter your current password or create a new one, then tap 'Migrate'.
2.b: Please enter your email and your current password, then tap 'Migrate'.

info.3: If you have already migrated your account on another device, use 'Sign in' instead.
info.4: If you experience any issues or data loss during the migration, please reach out via email for assistance.

in_progress.message: Please do not close the app until the migration is complete.
in_progress.title: Migration in Progress

success.message: Your account has been successfully migrated. Tap the continue button to start using the app.
success.title: Migration Successful

1.desc:
The Lord has led me for several years to create quotations in images from the Prophet's sermons and share them on the website "Spoken Word in Pictures".
Your Brother, Mikaël
1.title: Spoken Word in Pictures
